attributes.action: Make one minimum wage for all age groups.
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair that a 16/17 year old gets paid so little compared to somebody 10 years older for doing the same job and the same amount of hours for almost half the amount of pay. It also puts young people off wanting to get a job.
attributes.background: Have one minimum wage for all age groups

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555249
